dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents areas of inland water such as: lakes, ponds, rivers or streams in Swaziland. The Global Map Swaziland was developed from 1:250,000 topographic map, SWAZILAND (1988).Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
Swaziland. Department of the Surveyor General
